DOC.brief_summary: Dose escalation study assess safety tolerability TB-402 , monoclonal antibody direct FVIII , versus placebo healthy male volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase I Study Monoclonal Antibody TB-402 Healthy Male Volunteers
